comment: Export to JSON plugin for PHPMyAdmin

data.title: Web Application Developer
data.content:
We are looking for a technical, collaborative, and proactive person to join our team and take care of company online portals, such as our website, job and client support portals, and our internal systems. We are working on improving our digital presence and making our portals as user friendly as possible. That’s why we’re looking for someone who is interested in a whole bunch of things: backend development of web pages and applications, user management, API, and user interface and experience of web portals.

Your responsibilities

  • You will take active part in the technical development of all our public portals (web pages, job portal, support portal for customers) and internal systems (user management of our customers and API’s).
  • You will make sure our company website looks awesome on every device.
  • You will analyze the user experience and come up with ideas on how to attract more relevant visitors, keep them there, and bring them back again.
  • You will cooperate closely with our UX and UI designers to make our portals easy to use.

What we expect from you

  • You have been coding in PHP for a while now and using some of the PHP frameworks (Nette is a big advantage).
  • You have experience setting up simple databases using MySQL or PostgreSQL.
  • You are not afraid of modern JavaScript coding. We've been using jQuery, but together we are going to change that.
  • You have advanced level knowledge of cross-browser compatible HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • You are familiar with CSS preprocessors, such as SASS and LESS.
  • You are a team player.

data.title: Big Data Consultant
data.content:
Would you like to work with customers from all over the world? Come to research and implement Hadoop/Spark to extend our big data offering. Talk to developers about project specifics, requirements, and feedback from clients. Anticipate the next big thing.

Your mission

Research

Analyze Hadoop/Spark ecosystems and find ways to benefit from integration with our products and solutions.

Innovation

Work with our customers to find new opportunities where big data can help their businesses.

Proof of concept

Prepare, manage, and deliver POCs from beginning to end using a wide array of technologies.

Progress

Provide feedback to product managers and developers. Explore new markets, look for business opportunities, and support marketing initiatives.

Is this you?

Basic skills

  • Java
  • SQL and relational DB principles
  • Unix shell

Bonus knowledge

  • Apache Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL, XSLT
  • Parallel programming and distributed systems
  • Computer science, graph theory, automata theory

Communication

You can effectively and comfortably communicate with English-speaking teams located around the world.

Ambition

You see challenges as opportunities. Why wait for a task list when you can start innovating right away?

data.title: UI Designer
data.content:
We are looking for a highly motivated and skilled Product Designer to join our existing design team. Building a data curation platform is no easy task. That’s why we are looking for the right people to help us achieve our mission even faster. We plan to revolutionize the multi-billion dollar market by introducing a self-service platform that will enable companies around the world to manage their data with ease.

What will your day look like

  • UX designers will become your best friends. You’ll cooperate every day.
  • It all starts with a wireframe and a verbal description of the feature you’ll be working on.
  • One design is usually not good enough, so you’ll create more variants so we have something to choose from.
  • By ‘we’ we mean our design team. All our UX and UI designers work closely together in order to deliver the best outcome possible.
  • We have our own UI library, and it’s gonna be your responsibility to continuously improve it with other UI designers.

We’re looking for someone who

  • Has experience designing B2C or B2B applications
  • Has worked with rich Internet applications (a huge plus)
  • Is able to articulate their design decisionsIs willing to go outside their comfort zone. What we do here is not easy and you will be challenged every day
  • Can communicate efficiently in English

Benefits and Perks

  • The opportunity to be involved in developing a cutting-edge B2B application
  • A mature and fun multicultural environment
  • Laptop and smartphone of your choice
  • Excellent coffee and refreshments in the kitchen, Lego, Xbox, Multisport card, sick days, flexible working hours, language courses, and other fun stuff

data.title: UX Designer
data.content:
We are looking for a highly motivated and skilled Product Designer to join our existing design team. Building a data curation platform is no easy task. That’s why we are looking for the right people to help us achieve our mission even faster. We plan to revolutionize the multi-billion dollar market by introducing a self-service platform that will enable companies around the world to manage their data with ease.

What will your day look like

  • Specification of the features is not set in stone – you will work on it together with the Product owner and scrum team
  • Every designer is responsible for given product so your job will be to continuously improve the product you are focusing on
  • You will create bunch of prototypes before you come up with the final version
  • User testing and analytical tools will help you discover what needs to be improved
  • Don’t worry, you won’t do it alone. Other designers will help you during the week and you will also meet regularly in Design Community
  • All our products are integrated into one platform so you will be shaping this platform together with other designers

We’re looking for someone who

  • Has experience with designing B2C or B2B applications.
  • Working with data rich applications is huge plus
  • You should be able to articulate your design decisions
  • You have to be willing to go outside your comfort zone, what we do here is not easy and you will challenged every day
  • Can communicate efficiently in English

Benefits and Perks

  • The opportunity to be involved in developing a cutting-edge B2B application
  • A mature and fun multicultural environment
  • Laptop and smartphone of your choice
  • Excellent coffee and refreshments in the kitchen, Lego, Xbox, Multisport card, sick days, flexible working hours, language courses, and other fun stuff
